Some distance from the battle:

After a long 20 minute chase, Trelos stopped his pursuit of
Ravenchief, realizing that there was much less boring prey to
slaughter.  He stopped suddenly and with a slight roll on the ground,
he made a complete 180 and ran back toward base at double-speed.

Seeing his pursuer was no longer distracted, Ravenchief turned around
as well, hoping to draw the beast back away from the battle.
Surprisingly, the predecon's speed was faster than his, even though he
was a flyer.

"Amazing, that dog-pred's groundspeed is faster than I can fly...
uhhhh he's headed back your way chief." said Ravenchief over the
Maximal radio channel.

"Just what we need..." said Perseus, sounding annoyed.

Meanwhile...

Narrowly escaping a volley of explosive rounds.  Finding another spot,
Lord Perseus looked around for another target.

OOC:  sorry for the delay...been lazy about posting.  Could someone
tell me who's still fighting outside and who is inside?
